item.description:
Every year we award the Robert Austin Memorial Scholarship to a deserving high school senior. This year we are having an auction to support the scholarship program. So come and enjoy the proceedings. Bid on an item or service, or, even better, donate an item or service. For instance, frequent flyer miles, PC help, timeshare weeks and/or weekends and dinners with your Beanstalk friends are items that have been sold in the past.

BYOB and a dish to share. Jeanne and Wayne are supplying hotdogs and hamburgers.  Please bring side dishes that don't need any further cooking (i.e. either cold dishes or items already hot when you arrive.)

Donations:  Let Sue Flynn know if you're interested in donating something to the auction.

Directions This is a private party for full dues paying members and their guests.  See the May Bean Pod for details and directions.
item.name: BBTC Scholarship Benefit Auction at Jeanne & Wayne's in Attleboro
